benchmark_details.name: WaterER
benchmark_details.overview: WaterER is a domain-specific benchmark suite established to evaluate the contributions of large language models (LLMs) in water engineering and research tasks.
benchmark_details.data_type: multiple-choice questions and titles for research papers

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capabilities of large language models in understanding and responding to technical water-related tasks.

data.source: Various reputable publications and technical resources pertaining to water engineering and research.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy of the models' performances on zero-shot and five-shot settings.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in handling domain-specific tasks.
methodology.validation: Dataset divided into a 10% validation set and a 90% test set.
